description: A fast-paced fighting game where any hit means DEATH! Battle your friends as a vastly diverse selection of characters, experiencing intense combat where every blow earns a kill, and skill reigns supreme. Brawl amidst a huge selection of maps, each set in a post-apocalyptic future and featuring unique elements that can change the face of a battle. And what's victory without a little dance?
name: Blast Brawl 2
intro:
Fast-paced combat where any hit means DEATH!
A diverse set of champions with unique abilities and play styles!
Deadly enemies and bosses to test your mettle!
